page.title: 11Landscape and Buildings
page.content: In Ingst there is no church. The nearest churches and chapels are in Olveston, Tockington, Aust, Elberton and Pilning. There is a dissused church in Northwick the tower of which is very interesting. There have been several churches on that spot. The first of which was built in the 12th century by the Normans. There have been several churches on that spot because the foundations sank and the churches fell to the ground. The church which is standing now is St Thomas's church. Another building of interest is the ESPERANZA it is the oldest in Aust. Some people say that some of the timbers were from the boat{ESPERANZA which sank in the river Severn. In Aust there is also a pub which is over 200 years old.
